inclusion.criterion: HDMs-associated allergic rhinitis, conjunctivitis and/or asthma
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Sensitization to HDMs as proven by a skin prick test or a serum specific IgE assay
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient eligible for HDMs sublingual immunotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient who never received HDMs sublingual allergen immunotherapy
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient in-print and orally informed on data recorded about him/her in connection with the study objectives
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Patient and parents (or guardians) agreeing to participate in the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient who already received HDMs sublingual allergen immunotherapy
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger
